programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyone's guess. Meanwhile Lamput's facing a whole different challenge: a lost baby elephant is looking for her mama, and seems to have a knack for getting in all kinds of trouble along the way. Lamput and the baby elephant do eventually find the mama pachyderm - with help from the Docs. And their stupid pit trap. Yet again these guys have caught more than they bargained for...

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Welcome to Muchmore Manor, home of uber-rich senior Mrs Muchmore and her beloved dog with a red bow, Bentley. They want for nothing - unlike the down-on-his-luck trash-eating raccoon, who spends his days jealously gazing at the constant food deliveries to the Manor. Eventually it becomes too much for the little scavenger, and he gets an idea - he'll disguise himself as an adorable kitty cat and infiltrate the manor, where it'll be a never-ending buffet! Believe it or not - thanks to a snazzy bow, and an adorable little 'meow', his insane plan works. Mrs. Muchmore names him "Taffy" and showers the "cat" with the kind of cuddling that her dog could only dream of. Bentley the dog is no dummy, though - he knows that Taffy's a raccoon, and will stop at nothing to take down the intruder by exposing him as the dirty rodent he is! They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Welcome to Muchmore Manor, home of uber-rich senior Mrs Muchmore and her beloved dog with a red bow, Bentley. They want for nothing - unlike the down-on-his-luck trash-eating raccoon, who spends his days jealously gazing at the constant food deliveries to the Manor. Eventually it becomes too much for the little scavenger, and he gets an idea - he'll disguise himself as an adorable kitty cat and infiltrate the manor, where it'll be a never-ending buffet! Believe it or not - thanks to a snazzy bow, and an adorable little 'meow', his insane plan works. Mrs. Muchmore names him "Taffy" and showers the "cat" with the kind of cuddling that her dog could only dream of. Bentley the dog is no dummy, though - he knows that Taffy's a raccoon, and will stop at nothing to take down the intruder by exposing him as the dirty rodent he is! They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Welcome to Muchmore Manor, home of uber-rich senior Mrs Muchmore and her beloved dog with a red bow, Bentley. They want for nothing - unlike the down-on-his-luck trash-eating raccoon, who spends his days jealously gazing at the constant food deliveries to the Manor. Eventually it becomes too much for the little scavenger, and he gets an idea - he'll disguise himself as an adorable kitty cat and infiltrate the manor, where it'll be a never-ending buffet! Believe it or not - thanks to a snazzy bow, and an adorable little 'meow', his insane plan works. Mrs. Muchmore names him "Taffy" and showers the "cat" with the kind of cuddling that her dog could only dream of. Bentley the dog is no dummy, though - he knows that Taffy's a raccoon, and will stop at nothing to take down the intruder by exposing him as the dirty rodent he is! They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summer's mysteries and phenomena?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in THE TOM AND JERRY SHOW, a fresh take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility of the original, the all-new series shines a brightly colored, high-definition lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time. Comprised of two 11-minute shorts, each episode will feature Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse plotting against each other in their traditional suburban setting, as well as additional storylines where their rivalry is set in more fantastic worlds, like a medieval castle or even a mad scientist's lab. With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is Back! Mr Bean is back for a second series of his animated adventures. Starring in 52 brand new episodes Mr Bean creates his own electricity wins a cruise inadvertently becomes a teacher makes his own horror movie is hypnotised wins a wrestling match and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. This series follows Mr Bean his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life.

This series follows Mr Bean his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Following a slip up, Alice accidentally erases all of Lewis' memories about her. Now, the rabbit not only doesn't recognize her, he's convinced he's never even laid eyes on her before! Eager to get her bestie back, Alice sets about trying to make him relive various experiences they shared in the past. Unfortunately, this only gets him riled up and stressed!... Okay, the only way she's going to be able to pull this off is by proving her friendship to him, undeniably!...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: The Queen and Alice are playing against each other in a croquet game Wonderland-style: if Alice wins (which the Queen sees as impossible!), all the Wonderland residents will hereafter be allowed to win - not just the Queen, as has always been the case up until now!...

programme.title: Pat the Dog
programme.desc: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat has always been a hero! Pat is the 'little dog next door', the friend you dream of having! With his big snout that sounds like a horn, he doesn't look like much, but he is devoted and courageous. To give himself extra strength and courage, he won't hesitate to don a cape, or cobble together some gear to leap into the heat of the action and take up any challenge. He overcomes the insurmountable with his improvised plans and his canine genius! His missions are sometimes perilous, often surprising and above all, constantly funny! When you see him shoot into the sky from a clothes line, or strap himself to a remote-controlled car to rescue someone…You might think he's a little 'wacko'! Or a little reckless…Or a little of both! Typical hero behaviour. With Lola, the only child in the family, who loves to play with Pat, and Hoodie, the adorable cat and newcomer to the family who is always getting in trouble, Pat has his hands full!

programme.title: Kingdom Force
programme.desc: Kingdom Force is a 24/7 search and rescue unit dedicated to helping their fellow animals. The team of five, diverse animal heroes and their all-terrain vehicles serve and protect the citizens of the Five Kingdoms, while their massive, mobile HQ constantly patrols in search of action and adventure. When the peril gets too hot to handle, the team shouts their rallying cry of "Kingdom Force: Unite!" and the vehicles fluidly transform into a massive, state-of-the-art rescue robot that combines all the strengths of the five animal heroes of Kingdom Force. Through team-work, cooperation, and embracing diversity, there is no challenge the Kingdom Force team can't handle! Led by the fearless wolf, Luka, this team has a carnivorous appetite for danger and thrills and there's no operation they can't pull off with the help of their giant rescue robot, Alpha-Mech...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes follows the Looney Tunes gang as they grow up, learn about friendship, how to deal with bullies and leaving the nursery. Baby Bugs Bunny leads his friends and wants to be a star, Baby Lola daydreams a lot, Baby Daffy always wants his own way, Baby Sylvester gets easily scared, Baby Taz loves the good things in life and finally, Baby Tweety is kind and caring. Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: While on a seemingly endless summer vacation with his Grandpa Max and Cousin Gwen, Ben Tennyson discovers an alien watch: the Omnitrix. This device gives Ben the ability to transform into any one of ten spectacular and powerful aliens! Ben, Gwen and Max travel the country in their motor home affectionately known as the Rust Bucket seeing the sights, stumbling into adventures and beating down would-be villains while generally having a blast!

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Axel, a 9-year-old boy who can transform into a living action figure, gains a wild new perspective on the world as he wrangles a team of quirky smart-toys on the biggest small adventures a kid could ever imagine. Life as a toy superhero has its pluses and minuses. On the upside, Axel has massive mecha suit power, a cool energy sword, an impenetrable shield and other abilities he himself hasn't even discovered yet. Axel is much stronger, more skilled and faster than when he's his human self. On the downside, toy Axel is only seven-inches tall, and the world around him is no longer adapted to his size: the garden turns into a huge mysterious jungle, a sandbox becomes a desert...! The real world gets a whole lot more complicated and dangerous when Axel sees it from a toy point of view!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny might be a man of science, but he's more than happy to get his fortune told for a laugh. The palm-reader sees alarming visions of Skinny's near future; mostly visions that relate to Skinny being squashed, smooshed or otherwise smeared. It's kind of Skinny's own fault; maybe if he paid a bit less attention to chasing Lamput and a bit more attention to not getting squashed, smooshed or smeared, he wouldn't need constant rescuing by a frazzled mystic...

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summer's mysteries and phenomena?

With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When an accident leaves Jerry wrapped head to toe in bandages and unable to take his scout troop camping, a guilt-ridden Tom decides to lead the kids into the woods himself. Stuck at home, Jerry can't help but imagine everything that could possibly go wrong.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Today, Wonderland is celebrating "Qweensmas!" Well, more precisely, the Queen is the only one celebrating because at this time of year, all the residents have to give her their stuff, whether they like it or not! Alice finds the whole tradition so unfair and speaks her mind to the Queen. So they come to an agreement: the monarch will give her subjects their stuff back… if and only if Alice and Lewis give her a better gift than ALL the other gifts combined! Mission impossible? Not for Alice and Lewis! No sir: this year, EVERYONE in Wonderland will be spending a very Merry Qweensmas, not just the Queen!...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Alice drops in on Lewis unannounced, making him jump while he's adjusting the clock. It's a disaster: the clock goes on the blink and the facetious little cuckoo jumps on this opportunity to scram! The Queen is famished and says she'll give Alice and Lewis a big punishment if the cuckoo isn't back in time to announce teatime! And so ensues a wacky and very lively cuckoo hunt involving everyone… Teatime can NOT be late, no matter what!!...

programme.title: Pat the Dog
programme.desc: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat has always been a hero! Pat is the 'little dog next door', the friend you dream of having! With his big snout that sounds like a horn, he doesn't look like much, but he is devoted and courageous. To give himself extra strength and courage, he won't hesitate to don a cape, or cobble together some gear to leap into the heat of the action and take up any challenge. He overcomes the insurmountable with his improvised plans and his canine genius! His missions are sometimes perilous, often surprising and above all, constantly funny! When you see him shoot into the sky from a clothes line, or strap himself to a remote-controlled car to rescue someone…You might think he's a little 'wacko'! Or a little reckless…Or a little of both! Typical hero behaviour. With Lola, the only child in the family, who loves to play with Pat, and Hoodie, the adorable cat and newcomer to the family who is always getting in trouble, Pat has his hands full!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes follows the Looney Tunes gang as they grow up, learn about friendship, how to deal with bullies and leaving the nursery. Baby Bugs Bunny leads his friends and wants to be a star, Baby Lola daydreams a lot, Baby Daffy always wants his own way, Baby Sylvester gets easily scared, Baby Taz loves the good things in life and finally, Baby Tweety is kind and caring. Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes follows the Looney Tunes gang as they grow up, learn about friendship, how to deal with bullies and leaving the nursery. Baby Bugs Bunny leads his friends and wants to be a star, Baby Lola daydreams a lot, Baby Daffy always wants his own way, Baby Sylvester gets easily scared, Baby Taz loves the good things in life and finally, Baby Tweety is kind and caring. Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Axel, a 9-year-old boy who can transform into a living action figure, gains a wild new perspective on the world as he wrangles a team of quirky smart-toys on the biggest small adventures a kid could ever imagine. Life as a toy superhero has its pluses and minuses. On the upside, Axel has massive mecha suit power, a cool energy sword, an impenetrable shield and other abilities he himself hasn't even discovered yet. Axel is much stronger, more skilled and faster than when he's his human self. On the downside, toy Axel is only seven-inches tall, and the world around him is no longer adapted to his size: the garden turns into a huge mysterious jungle, a sandbox becomes a desert...! The real world gets a whole lot more complicated and dangerous when Axel sees it from a toy point of view!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes
programme.desc: New Looney Tunes, known as Wabbit: A Looney Tunes Production follows new adventures of smart and hilarious Bugs Bunny. He is always busy with new bright ideas and plans and this time some new friends are by his side: Squeaks the Squirrel and baby Bigfoot. Bugs Bunny is going through serious battles with evil he has not met before: skilled ninjas, barbarians and even death in a specific form. We are going to meet old characters as well- Yosemite Sam and Wile E. Coyote. This time Yosemite becomes a bookkeeper, but he does not enjoy it as it is too boring and too diligent for his personality. These two are still trying to make things lively for Bunny, so Bunny has to watch out...

programme.title: New Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Follow the hilarious, heroic and mischievous Bugs Bunny in a series of slapstick comedic shorts that find the carrot-loving rabbit matching his wits against classic characters such as Theodore "Tasmanian" Devil, Wile E. Coyote and Yosemite Sam. Along the way, Bugs encounters brand-new foes but he has some help from new friends like Bigfoot and Squeaks the Squirrel!...

When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone...

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Trgovina igračaka ima stroj koji može napraviti kakvu god igračku želiš. No, kad ga Krš upotrijebi za stvaranje divovskih igračaka koje stvore kaos u gradu, Žar i ekipa ih moraju zaustaviti.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Gaskvač poziva Žara i AJa na zabavu sa sladoledom. No... zaboravio je sladoled! Zato se Žar pretvara u sladoledarski kamion i žuri Gaskvačevoj kući.

programme.title: Psići u Ophodnji
programme.desc: Psići u ophodnji je serija za predškolsku djecu u kojoj su glavne zvijezde psići junaci: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Rubble i Skye, a predvodi ih desetogodošnji dječak s talentom za tehnologiju - Ryder. Njihov jedinstveni spoj bistrih umova, super vozila i psećeg šarma pomaže im da zajedničkim trudom uspijevaju u misijama zaštite Zaljeva pustolovina i njegovih stanovnika. Od vatrogasca Marshalla, do policajca Chasea, do Skye koja visoko leti u svom helikopteru, svaki psić donosi jedinstvenu osobnost i vještine u tim, koji je pravi primjer timskog rada i građanske pristojnosti. Svaki od njih ima poseban ruksak na leđima koji im pomaže da se snađu u svakoj situaciji- od spašavanja mačića do spašavanja vlaka od padajućeg kamenja. I bez obzira koliko velika pustolovina bila, psići uvijek imaju vremena za igranje, i češkanje ušiju od Rydera. Zabavna sitnica: Ryder je spasio sve psiće i naučio ih njihovim vještinama.

programme.title: Odred jelena
programme.desc: Animirana serija. Tim prijatelja, malenih jelena po imenu Kai, Lola, Rammy i Bobbi kreće u pravu pustolovinu! Njihov je zadatak štititi ljude i životinje Central Forest uz pomoć planetarne moći. Pogledajte kako se zajedno bore protiv problema!

programme.title: Najbolji u letu
programme.desc: Najbolji u letu je pustolovna serija za predškolce koja prati ekipu mladih ptica koje pohađaju akademiju za elitne letače.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power
programme.desc: U ovoj dječjoj emisiji glume popularne YouTube zvijezde, Calvin (7 godina) i Kaison (4 godine). Svaka petominutna epizoda fokusira se na važnost igre kao zabavne i bitne za rani dječji razvoj. Gledatelji mogu gledati braću kako se igraju u njihovoj dječjoj špilji gdje moraju prevladati niz zabavnih i uzbudljivih izazova, uključujući divovske torte, nestale prijatelje, razigrana čudovišta i igračke bez kontrole...

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power
programme.desc: U ovoj dječjoj emisiji glume popularne YouTube zvijezde, Calvin (7 godina) i Kaison (4 godine). Svaka petominutna epizoda fokusira se na važnost igre kao zabavne i bitne za rani dječji razvoj. programme.title: Pustolovine mede Paddingtona
programme.desc: Paddington je šarmantan mladi medvjedić koji je napustio Peru kako bi živio s obitelji Brown u Londonu. Paddington je ljubazan, susretljiv i uvijek voljan pomoći drugima. Njegova pomoć često završava u kaosu i neredu, ali njegovo je srce na pravom mjestu. Znatiželjna priroda Paddingtona može ga dovesti u neke škakljive situacije, pogotovo ako jede jedan od svojih najdražih sendviča s marmeladom!...

programme.title: Vodeni svijet Malih Gupija
programme.desc: Crtana serija Vodeni svet Malih Gupija prati podvodne pustolovine grupe predškolaca koji izgledaju poput sirena i žive u izmišljenom podvodnom gradu po imenu Mjehurićgrad.

programme.title: Kuharica Kiflica
programme.desc: Gđa Marmelada misli da nema na čemu biti zahvalna, ali Kiflići će joj pokazati pravi smisao Dana zahvalnosti. / Zrika i prijatelji otvaraju štand s limunadom, no... teško je biti šefica! Hoće li Zrika naučiti pravu mjeru i postati dobar vođa?...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Dječja animirana serija "Blue's Clues & You" predstavlja razne igrice koje samo čekaju na vas! Zajedno dođimo do rješenja mnogih malih misterija koje ove igrice skrivaju, a Blue će, svakim otiskom šape, prepoznati tragove u svom zanimljivom animiranom svijetu. Uživajte u zabavnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Dan je utrke, a Krš vara dvostruko više kako bi porazio Žara i Watts - tako što će poslati oba vozača jako daleko! Ali Žar i Watts su odlučni spasiti AJ -a i Gabby i vratiti se na vrijeme kako bi pobijedili u utrci!

programme.title: Psići u Ophodnji
programme.desc: Psići u ophodnji je serija za predškolsku djecu u kojoj su glavne zvijezde psići junaci: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Rubble i Skye, a predvodi ih desetogodošnji dječak s talentom za tehnologiju - Ryder. Njihov jedinstveni spoj bistrih umova, super vozila i psećeg šarma pomaže im da zajedničkim trudom uspijevaju u misijama zaštite Zaljeva pustolovina i njegovih stanovnika. Od vatrogasca Marshalla, do policajca Chasea, do Skye koja visoko leti u svom helikopteru, svaki psić donosi jedinstvenu osobnost i vještine u tim, koji je pravi primjer timskog rada i građanske pristojnosti. Svaki od njih ima poseban ruksak na leđima koji im pomaže da se snađu u svakoj situaciji- od spašavanja mačića do spašavanja vlaka od padajućeg kamenja. I bez obzira koliko velika pustolovina bila, psići uvijek imaju vremena za igranje, i češkanje ušiju od Rydera. Zabavna sitnica: Ryder je spasio sve psiće i naučio ih njihovim vještinama.

Svaki od njih ima poseban ruksak na leđima koji im pomaže da se snađu u svakoj situaciji- od spašavanja mačića do spašavanja vlaka od padajućeg kamenja. I bez obzira koliko velika pustolovina bila, psići uvijek imaju vremena za igranje, i češkanje ušiju od Rydera. Zabavna sitnica: Ryder je spasio sve psiće i naučio ih njihovim vještinama.

programme.title: Odred jelena
programme.desc: Animirana serija. Tim prijatelja, malenih jelena po imenu Kai, Lola, Rammy i Bobbi kreće u pravu pustolovinu! Njihov je zadatak štititi ljude i životinje Central Forest uz pomoć planetarne moći. Pogledajte kako se zajedno bore protiv problema!...

programme.title: Pustolovine mede Paddingtona
programme.desc: Paddington je šarmantan mladi medvjedić koji je napustio Peru kako bi živio s obitelji Brown u Londonu. Paddington je ljubazan, susretljiv i uvijek voljan pomoći drugima. Njegova pomoć često završava u kaosu i neredu, ali njegovo je srce na pravom mjestu. Znatiželjna priroda Paddingtona može ga dovesti u neke škakljive situacije, pogotovo ako jede jedan od svojih najdražih sendviča s marmeladom!...

programme.title: Najbolji u letu
programme.desc: Najbolji u letu je pustolovna serija za predškolce koja prati ekipu mladih ptica koje pohađaju akademiju za elitne letače.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Žar i čudovišni strojevi je animirana serija za predškolsku djecu. Prati dogodovštine čudovišnog kamiona Žara i njegovog najboljeg prijatelja, dječaka AJa.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Žar i čudovišni strojevi je animirana serija za predškolsku djecu. Prati dogodovštine čudovišnog kamiona Žara i njegovog najboljeg prijatelja, dječaka AJa.

programme.title: Inovator Rusty
programme.desc: Botovi su dobili virozu i stvaraju kaos agresivnim kihanjem. Djeca im moraju naći lijek. / Rusty, Ruby i Botosaur moraju naći Bytesa koji je slučajno iskopao tunel u rudnik, a onda i iskopati i izvući van...

programme.title: Abby Hatcher, mucolovka
programme.desc: Djevojčica Abby Hatcher živi u obiteljskom hotelu u kojem upoznaje svoje nove prijatelje, mala bića koja se nazivaju Fuzzly. Jedan od njih, Bozzly, postaje Abbyjin najbolji prijatelj, a ona mu pomaže u nevoljama koje je stvorio. Nasmijte se uz zabavne minute ove serije i pogledajte koje su sve avanture ispred ovih malenih, ali nestašnih likova!...

programme.title: Kuharica Kiflica
programme.desc: Zrika želi iznenaditi Pepu tortom! Ali hoće li ju stići ispeći prije no što se Pepa vrati iz kupovine? / Zrika je izgubila u igri tijekom dana igara u bistrou. Hoće li naučiti gubiti s dostojanstvom ili će propustiti svu zabavu?...

programme.title: Vodeni svijet Malih Gupija
programme.desc: Crtana serija Vodeni svet Malih Gupija prati podvodne pustolovine grupe predškolaca koji izgledaju poput sirena i žive u izmišljenom podvodnom gradu po imenu Mjehurićgrad...

programme.title: Peppa Praščić
programme.desc: Serija za predškolski uzrast pod nazivom Peppa Praščić prikazuje život male svinje, njezine obitelji i prijatelja. Peppa se često brine za svoga mlađega brata, a najviše se raduje igranju s prijateljicama i skakanju u blatu.

programme.title: Peppa Praščić
programme.desc: Serija za predškolski uzrast pod nazivom Peppa Praščić prikazuje život male svinje, njezine obitelji i prijatelja. Peppa se često brine za svoga mlađega brata, a najviše se raduje igranju s prijateljicama i skakanju u blatu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Svakodnevna zabava s Barbapapom i njegovom obitelji, vrlo posebnom skupinom živopisnih bića koja se mogu promijeniti u sve oblike i veličine. Pridružite se svim avanturama i zabavi s ovom velikom sretnom obitelji! Ova animirana serija temelji se na uspješnoj seriji dječjih knjiga Annette Tison i Talusa Taylora. Prva knjiga Barbapapa objavljena je 1970. godine i od tada je prevedena na preko 30 jezika...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Dječja animirana serija "Blue's Clues & You" predstavlja razne igrice koje samo čekaju na vas! Zajedno dođimo do rješenja mnogih malih misterija koje ove igrice skrivaju, a Blue će, svakim otiskom šape, prepoznati tragove u svom zanimljivom animiranom svijetu. Uživajte u zabavnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Trgovina igračaka ima stroj koji može napraviti kakvu god igračku želiš. No, kad ga Krš upotrijebi za stvaranje divovskih igračaka koje stvore kaos u gradu, Žar i ekipa ih moraju zaustaviti.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Gaskvač poziva Žara i AJa na zabavu sa sladoledom. No... zaboravio je sladoled! Zato se Žar pretvara u sladoledarski kamion i žuri Gaskvačevoj kući.

programme.title: Psići u Ophodnji
programme.desc: Psići u ophodnji je serija za predškolsku djecu u kojoj su glavne zvijezde psići junaci: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Rubble i Skye, a predvodi ih desetogodošnji dječak s talentom za tehnologiju - Ryder. Njihov jedinstveni spoj bistrih umova, super vozila i psećeg šarma pomaže im da zajedničkim trudom uspijevaju u misijama zaštite Zaljeva pustolovina i njegovih stanovnika. Od vatrogasca Marshalla, do policajca Chasea, do Skye koja visoko leti u svom helikopteru, svaki psić donosi jedinstvenu osobnost i vještine u tim, koji je pravi primjer timskog rada i građanske pristojnosti. Svaki od njih ima poseban ruksak na leđima koji im pomaže da se snađu u svakoj situaciji- od spašavanja mačića do spašavanja vlaka od padajućeg kamenja. I bez obzira koliko velika pustolovina bila, psići uvijek imaju vremena za igranje, i češkanje ušiju od Rydera. Zabavna sitnica: Ryder je spasio sve psiće i naučio ih njihovim vještinama.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power
programme.desc: U ovoj dječjoj emisiji glume popularne YouTube zvijezde, Calvin (7 godina) i Kaison (4 godine). Svaka petominutna epizoda fokusira se na važnost igre kao zabavne i bitne za rani dječji razvoj. Gledatelji mogu gledati braću kako se igraju u njihovoj dječjoj špilji gdje moraju prevladati niz zabavnih i uzbudljivih izazova, uključujući divovske torte, nestale prijatelje, razigrana čudovišta i igračke bez kontrole...

programme.title: Najbolji u letu
programme.desc: Vrijeme je da novi kadeti zarade krila! Munja, Penny, Tin i Bruno se okupljaju na akademiji i započinju obuku. Naučit će upravljati posebnim vozilima i postati najbolji spasilački tim na otoku Veli Vihor!

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Žar posjećuje Brzinograd kako bi se utrkivao s novim prijateljima (gostuju: Danica Patrick, Jimmie Johnson, Kasey Kahne) u najdužoj utrci ikad: utrci od sto milja! U utrci sudjeluje i Krš, a on će napraviti bilo što kako bi pobijedio.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Žar i prijatelji odlaze u Brzinograd i pretvaraju se u trkaće aute kako bi sudjelovali u Polarnom derbiju. Utrkuju se po snijegu i ledu, a kad ih Krš odgura sa staze morat će ostati hladne glave kako bi uspjeli završiti utrku.

programme.title: Inovator Rusty
programme.desc: U želji da bude junak poput Rustya, Frankie stvara Super zlikovskog robota i programira ga da izgleda kao junak. / Kad svemirski brod padne na Zemlju, Rusty i Ruby pomažu vanzemaljcima vratiti se na njihov planet na vrijeme za najvažniji praznik!...

programme.title: Abby Hatcher, mucolovka
programme.desc: Djevojčica Abby Hatcher živi u obiteljskom hotelu u kojem upoznaje svoje nove prijatelje, mala bića koja se nazivaju Fuzzly. Jedan od njih, Bozzly, postaje Abbyjin najbolji prijatelj, a ona mu pomaže u nevoljama koje je stvorio. Nasmijte se uz zabavne minute ove serije i pogledajte koje su sve avanture ispred ovih malenih, ali nestašnih likova!...

programme.title: Kuharica Kiflica
programme.desc: Pepa je na nešto alergična, a svi misle da je to nešto Krafna! Hoće li se Kiflići morati odreći svoje mace? / Kiflica i gđa Marmelada obje peku quiche za gradonačelnicu. Koja će postati kraljica quichea?...

programme.title: Vodeni svijet Malih Gupija
programme.desc: Crtana serija Vodeni svet Malih Gupija prati podvodne pustolovine grupe predškolaca koji izgledaju poput sirena i žive u izmišljenom podvodnom gradu po imenu Mjehurićgrad.

programme.title: Peppa Praščić
programme.desc: Serija za predškolski uzrast pod nazivom Peppa Praščić prikazuje život male svinje, njezine obitelji i prijatelja. Peppa se često brine za svoga mlađega brata, a najviše se raduje igranju s prijateljicama i skakanju u blatu.

programme.title: Peppa Praščić
programme.desc: Serija za predškolski uzrast pod nazivom Peppa Praščić prikazuje život male svinje, njezine obitelji i prijatelja. Peppa se često brine za svoga mlađega brata, a najviše se raduje igranju s prijateljicama i skakanju u blatu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Svakodnevna zabava s Barbapapom i njegovom obitelji, vrlo posebnom skupinom živopisnih bića koja se mogu promijeniti u sve oblike i veličine. Pridružite se svim avanturama i zabavi s ovom velikom sretnom obitelji! Ova animirana serija temelji se na uspješnoj seriji dječjih knjiga Annette Tison i Talusa Taylora. Prva knjiga Barbapapa objavljena je 1970. godine i od tada je prevedena na preko 30 jezika...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Dječja animirana serija "Blue's Clues & You" predstavlja razne igrice koje samo čekaju na vas! Zajedno dođimo do rješenja mnogih malih misterija koje ove igrice skrivaju, a Blue će, svakim otiskom šape, prepoznati tragove u svom zanimljivom animiranom svijetu. Uživajte u zabavnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Trgovina igračaka ima stroj koji može napraviti kakvu god igračku želiš. No, kad ga Krš upotrijebi za stvaranje divovskih igračaka koje stvore kaos u gradu, Žar i ekipa ih moraju zaustaviti.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Gaskvač poziva Žara i AJa na zabavu sa sladoledom. No... zaboravio je sladoled! Zato se Žar pretvara u sladoledarski kamion i žuri Gaskvačevoj kući.

programme.title: Psići u Ophodnji
programme.desc: Psići u ophodnji je serija za predškolsku djecu u kojoj su glavne zvijezde psići junaci: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Rubble i Skye, a predvodi ih desetogodošnji dječak s talentom za tehnologiju - Ryder. Njihov jedinstveni spoj bistrih umova, super vozila i psećeg šarma pomaže im da zajedničkim trudom uspijevaju u misijama zaštite Zaljeva pustolovina i njegovih stanovnika. Od vatrogasca Marshalla, do policajca Chasea, do Skye koja visoko leti u svom helikopteru, svaki psić donosi jedinstvenu osobnost i vještine u tim, koji je pravi primjer timskog rada i građanske pristojnosti. Svaki od njih ima poseban ruksak na leđima koji im pomaže da se snađu u svakoj situaciji- od spašavanja mačića do spašavanja vlaka od padajućeg kamenja. I bez obzira koliko velika pustolovina bila, psići uvijek imaju vremena za igranje, i češkanje ušiju od Rydera. Zabavna sitnica: Ryder je spasio sve psiće i naučio ih njihovim vještinama.

programme.title: Psići u Ophodnji
programme.desc: Psići u ophodnji je serija za predškolsku djecu u kojoj su glavne zvijezde psići junaci: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Rubble i Skye, a predvodi ih desetogodošnji dječak s talentom za tehnologiju - Ryder. programme.title: Odred jelena
programme.desc: Animirana serija. Tim prijatelja, malenih jelena po imenu Kai, Lola, Rammy i Bobbi kreće u pravu pustolovinu! Njihov je zadatak štititi ljude i životinje Central Forest uz pomoć planetarne moći. Pogledajte kako se zajedno bore protiv problema!

programme.title: Najbolji u letu
programme.desc: Najbolji u letu je pustolovna serija za predškolce koja prati ekipu mladih ptica koje pohađaju akademiju za elitne letače.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power
programme.desc: U ovoj dječjoj emisiji glume popularne YouTube zvijezde, Calvin (7 godina) i Kaison (4 godine). Svaka petominutna epizoda fokusira se na važnost igre kao zabavne i bitne za rani dječji razvoj. Gledatelji mogu gledati braću kako se igraju u njihovoj dječjoj špilji gdje moraju prevladati niz zabavnih i uzbudljivih izazova, uključujući divovske torte, nestale prijatelje, razigrana čudovišta i igračke bez kontrole...

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power
programme.desc: U ovoj dječjoj emisiji glume popularne YouTube zvijezde, Calvin (7 godina) i Kaison (4 godine). programme.title: Pustolovine mede Paddingtona
programme.desc: Paddington je šarmantan mladi medvjedić koji je napustio Peru kako bi živio s obitelji Brown u Londonu. Paddington je ljubazan, susretljiv i uvijek voljan pomoći drugima. Njegova pomoć često završava u kaosu i neredu, ali njegovo je srce na pravom mjestu. Znatiželjna priroda Paddingtona može ga dovesti u neke škakljive situacije, pogotovo ako jede jedan od svojih najdražih sendviča s marmeladom!...

programme.title: Vodeni svijet Malih Gupija

programme.title: Kuharica Kiflica
programme.desc: Gđa Marmelada misli da nema na čemu biti zahvalna, ali Kiflići će joj pokazati pravi smisao Dana zahvalnosti. / Zrika i prijatelji otvaraju štand s limunadom, no... teško je biti šefica! Hoće li Zrika naučiti pravu mjeru i postati dobar vođa?...

Zajedno dođimo do rješenja mnogih malih misterija koje ove igrice skrivaju, a Blue će, svakim otiskom šape, prepoznati tragove u svom zanimljivom animiranom svijetu. Uživajte u zabavnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Trgovina igračaka ima stroj koji može napraviti kakvu god igračku želiš. No, kad ga Krš upotrijebi za stvaranje divovskih igračaka koje stvore kaos u gradu, Žar i ekipa ih moraju zaustaviti.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Gaskvač poziva Žara i AJa na zabavu sa sladoledom. No... zaboravio je sladoled! Zato se Žar pretvara u sladoledarski kamion i žuri Gaskvačevoj kući.

programme.title: Psići u Ophodnji
programme.desc: Psići u ophodnji je serija za predškolsku djecu u kojoj su glavne zvijezde psići junaci: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Rubble i Skye, a predvodi ih desetogodošnji dječak s talentom za tehnologiju - Ryder. Njihov jedinstveni spoj bistrih umova, super vozila i psećeg šarma pomaže im da zajedničkim trudom uspijevaju u misijama zaštite Zaljeva pustolovina i njegovih stanovnika. Od vatrogasca Marshalla, do policajca Chasea, do Skye koja visoko leti u svom helikopteru, svaki psić donosi jedinstvenu osobnost i vještine u tim, koji je pravi primjer timskog rada i građanske pristojnosti. Svaki od njih ima poseban ruksak na leđima koji im pomaže da se snađu u svakoj situaciji- od spašavanja mačića do spašavanja vlaka od padajućeg kamenja. I bez obzira koliko velika pustolovina bila, psići uvijek imaju vremena za igranje, i češkanje ušiju od Rydera. Zabavna sitnica: Ryder je spasio sve psiće i naučio ih njihovim vještinama.

programme.title: Psići u Ophodnji
programme.desc: Psići u ophodnji je serija za predškolsku djecu u kojoj su glavne zvijezde psići junaci: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Rubble i Skye, a predvodi ih desetogodošnji dječak s talentom za tehnologiju - Ryder. programme.title: Odred jelena
programme.desc: Animirana serija. Tim prijatelja, malenih jelena po imenu Kai, Lola, Rammy i Bobbi kreće u pravu pustolovinu! Njihov je zadatak štititi ljude i životinje Central Forest uz pomoć planetarne moći. Pogledajte kako se zajedno bore protiv problema!

programme.title: Najbolji u letu
programme.desc: Najbolji u letu je pustolovna serija za predškolce koja prati ekipu mladih ptica koje pohađaju akademiju za elitne letače.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power
programme.desc: U ovoj dječjoj emisiji glume popularne YouTube zvijezde, Calvin (7 godina) i Kaison (4 godine). Svaka petominutna epizoda fokusira se na važnost igre kao zabavne i bitne za rani dječji razvoj. Gledatelji mogu gledati braću kako se igraju u njihovoj dječjoj špilji gdje moraju prevladati niz zabavnih i uzbudljivih izazova, uključujući divovske torte, nestale prijatelje, razigrana čudovišta i igračke bez kontrole...

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power
programme.desc: U ovoj dječjoj emisiji glume popularne YouTube zvijezde, Calvin (7 godina) i Kaison (4 godine). Svaka petominutna epizoda fokusira se na važnost igre kao zabavne i bitne za rani dječji razvoj. Gledatelji mogu gledati braću kako se igraju u njihovoj dječjoj špilji gdje moraju prevladati niz zabavnih i uzbudljivih izazova, uključujući divovske torte, nestale prijatelje, razigrana čudovišta i igračke bez kontrole...

programme.title: Pustolovine mede Paddingtona
programme.desc: Paddington je šarmantan mladi medvjedić koji je napustio Peru kako bi živio s obitelji Brown u Londonu. Paddington je ljubazan, susretljiv i uvijek voljan pomoći drugima. Njegova pomoć često završava u kaosu i neredu, ali njegovo je srce na pravom mjestu. Znatiželjna priroda Paddingtona može ga dovesti u neke škakljive situacije, pogotovo ako jede jedan od svojih najdražih sendviča s marmeladom!...

programme.title: Vodeni svijet Malih Gupija
programme.desc: Crtana serija Vodeni svet Malih Gupija prati podvodne pustolovine grupe predškolaca koji izgledaju poput sirena i žive u izmišljenom podvodnom gradu po imenu Mjehurićgrad.

programme.title: Kuharica Kiflica
programme.desc: Gđa Marmelada misli da nema na čemu biti zahvalna, ali Kiflići će joj pokazati pravi smisao Dana zahvalnosti. / Zrika i prijatelji otvaraju štand s limunadom, no... teško je biti šefica! Hoće li Zrika naučiti pravu mjeru i postati dobar vođa?...

programme.desc: Dan je utrke, a Krš vara dvostruko više kako bi porazio Žara i Watts - tako što će poslati oba vozača jako daleko! Ali Žar i Watts su odlučni spasiti AJ -a i Gabby i vratiti se na vrijeme kako bi pobijedili u utrci!

programme.title: Peppa Praščić
programme.desc: Serija za predškolski uzrast pod nazivom Peppa Praščić prikazuje život male svinje, njezine obitelji i prijatelja. Peppa se često brine za svoga mlađega brata, a najviše se raduje igranju s prijateljicama i skakanju u blatu.

programme.title: Peppa Praščić
programme.desc: Serija za predškolski uzrast pod nazivom Peppa Praščić prikazuje život male svinje, njezine obitelji i prijatelja. Peppa se često brine za svoga mlađega brata, a najviše se raduje igranju s prijateljicama i skakanju u blatu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Svakodnevna zabava s Barbapapom i njegovom obitelji, vrlo posebnom skupinom živopisnih bića koja se mogu promijeniti u sve oblike i veličine. Pridružite se svim avanturama i zabavi s ovom velikom sretnom obitelji! Ova animirana serija temelji se na uspješnoj seriji dječjih knjiga Annette Tison i Talusa Taylora. Prva knjiga Barbapapa objavljena je 1970. godine i od tada je prevedena na preko 30 jezika...

programme.title: Najbolji u letu
programme.desc: Vrijeme je da novi kadeti zarade krila! Munja, Penny, Tin i Bruno se okupljaju na akademiji i započinju obuku. Naučit će upravljati posebnim vozilima i postati najbolji spasilački tim na otoku Veli Vihor!

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Žar posjećuje Brzinograd kako bi se utrkivao s novim prijateljima (gostuju: Danica Patrick, Jimmie Johnson, Kasey Kahne) u najdužoj utrci ikad: utrci od sto milja! U utrci sudjeluje i Krš, a on će napraviti bilo što kako bi pobijedio.

programme.title: Žar i čudovišni strojevi
programme.desc: Žar i prijatelji odlaze u Brzinograd i pretvaraju se u trkaće aute kako bi sudjelovali u Polarnom derbiju. Utrkuju se po snijegu i ledu, a kad ih Krš odgura sa staze morat će ostati hladne glave kako bi uspjeli završiti utrku.

programme.title: Inovator Rusty
programme.desc: U želji da bude junak poput Rustya, Frankie stvara Super zlikovskog robota i programira ga da izgleda kao junak. / Kad svemirski brod padne na Zemlju, Rusty i Ruby pomažu vanzemaljcima vratiti se na njihov planet na vrijeme za najvažniji praznik!...

programme.title: Abby Hatcher, mucolovka
programme.desc: Djevojčica Abby Hatcher živi u obiteljskom hotelu u kojem upoznaje svoje nove prijatelje, mala bića koja se nazivaju Fuzzly. Jedan od njih, Bozzly, postaje Abbyjin najbolji prijatelj, a ona mu pomaže u nevoljama koje je stvorio. Nasmijte se uz zabavne minute ove serije i pogledajte koje su sve avanture ispred ovih malenih, ali nestašnih likova!...

programme.title: Kuharica Kiflica
programme.desc: Pepa je na nešto alergična, a svi misle da je to nešto Krafna! Hoće li se Kiflići morati odreći svoje mace? / Kiflica i gđa Marmelada obje peku quiche za gradonačelnicu. Koja će postati kraljica quichea?...

programme.title: Top Models
programme.desc: Ever wondered what it would be like to live the luxurious life of a successful model? Top Models is a rare chance to see what happens on the other side of the camera. Interviews with photographers give additional insight into this glamourous lifestyle. Featuring some of the most famous runway stars working today including Kate Bock, Gigi Hadid, Barbara Palvin, Irina Shayk and more!...

Have a look at the best and the trendiest events around the world- from amazing lake Como in Italy, Gstaad Palace in Switzerland to luxurious places in Bodrum Turkey. Enjoy classy Paris, energetic St Tropez and ultimate fashion destination- London. Find out the best places with main fashion brands, fashion trends and fashionable lifestyle...

programme.title: Fashion Week
programme.desc: It-girls, celebrities, fashion-icons, fashion experts, buyers, designers, stylists and fashion-gurus are the key words to describe this special magic period in world fashion industry- Fashion Week. Witness the glamour and energy of fashion industry, watch the runway and be the first to check up on fashion trends and to find out which of them influence the current and upcoming seasons. Each show is a colossal event in a designer's life. The most significant fashion weeks are held in the four fashion capitals: New York, London, Milan and Paris, known as the "Big Four"...

programme.title: Fashion News
programme.desc: Rocco Leo Gaglioti, travels the world to find out about the newest trends, upcoming designers and the latest news from the fashion industry. Talking to fashion designers and stars in the industry, Rocco gives a lowdown on all of the latest fashion gossip, giving a live sneak-peek into the fashion world...

programme.title: F-People
programme.desc: Since 1997, Fashion TV has been setting the highest standards for fashion and lifestyle broadcasting. It provides open-minded and informative programming that is beyond reach anywhere else. Fashion TV has a unique modern style that is the reason for powerful cooperation with famous brands all over the world. If you are into fashion, style, trends, beauty, modelling, design, fashion shows and people who create all this glamorous magic than it is all you can dream of. F-people highlights most relevant moments of fashion events in the world...

programme.title: Alessandra Ambrosio Story
programme.desc: The Story of Alessandra Ambrosio is part of a series of films taking an in-depth into the lives of some of the fashion industries biggest names. This documentary looks at highlights and important events in Alessandra Ambrosio's incredible modelling career...

programme.title: Top Models
programme.desc: Ever wondered what it would be like to live the luxurious life of a successful model? Top Models is a rare chance to see what happens on the other side of the camera. This behind-the-scenes look at photoshoots across the globe takes you to some of the world's most stunning locations. From exotic beaches to stylish indoor locations. Some of the most beautiful girls on the planet reveal what life is really like for professional models, on camera and off. They also share their experiences and opinions on beauty, fashion and more. Interviews with photographers give additional insight into this glamourous lifestyle. Featuring some of the most famous runway stars working today including Kate Bock, Gigi Hadid, Barbara Palvin, Irina Shayk and more!...

programme.title: F-Parties
programme.desc: FashionTV gives you a unique chance to be part of the world's greatest parties right from your home! Listen to world famous DJ's, mixing the greatest tracks in all the fashion bars and hottest clubs around the world...
